RECENT WORKS

TATTOO

Express yourself creatively with a custom tattoo from our artists. We can do any style, color, or design you want. Bring your own ideas or choose from our thousands of options.

  • Abstract
  • Realism
  • Mandala
  • Geometry
  • Couple Tattoo
  • Script
  • Small Tattoo

PIERCING

If you have been dreaming of getting a piercing, we are here to make that dream a reality. We can pierce any part of your body that you indicate. All of our equipment is thoroughly sterilized and individually packaged to ensure your health is never compromised. We perform the piercings in private to ensure your comfort at all times.

  • Ear
  • Nose
  • Lip
  • Eyebrow
  • Tongue
  • Cartilage

DRAWING

Art is all about making cool stuff with your eyes, ears, or body. It’s how you show your awesome ideas, skills, or feelings to the world. We can help you turn your own art into something you can hold in your hands.

  • Ear
  • Nose
  • Lip
  • Eyebrow
  • Tongue
  • Cartilage
